titleStmt.title: Insulae fortunatae A discourse shewing the happiness of these nations under our present governours & government, or, How they may be happy if they will themselves : delivered for substance in a sermon on a late solemn day appointed by authority for imploring the blessing of God upon his Majesty and the present Parliament / by R.A., pastor of the church at Henfield.
titleStmt.author: R. A. (Richard Allen)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
